data.title: Ryan Tedder Promises New OneRepublic Music Is Right Around the Corner: â€˜Quietly Gathering Loads of Songsâ€™
data.meta_description: OneRepublic singer/songwriter Ryan Tedder says he's been 'gathering loads' on new songs for 2024, with the next single already picked.
data.text:
Add new music from OneRepublic to things you can look forward to next year. The groupâ€™s Grammy-winning singer and songwriter, Ryan Tedder, broke the good news to fans on Sunday (Dec. 17), tweeting that he is â€œworking on New @OneRepublic,â€ tracks and noting that heâ€™s been â€œquietly gathering loads of songs for 2024.â€

Even better, the prolific producer/writer added, â€œthink we have the next single picked ğŸ˜‰ (praying hands, raising hands and heart emoji).â€

Tedder has written and produced hits for everyone from BeyoncÃ©, Ed Sheeran, Miley Cyrus and Lady Gaga to Taylor Swift, Lil Nas X, Adele, Paul McCartney and, most recently, Tate McRae (â€œGreedy). He has also been the mastermind behind his own bandâ€™s Billboard Hot 100 No. 2 hits â€œCounting Starsâ€ and â€œApologize.â€ The group that also includes guitarist Zach Filkins, multi-instrumentalist Drew Brown, drummer Eddie Fisher, keyboardist Brent Kutzle and keyboardist Brian Willett released their most recent album, Human, in 2021; the LP topped out at No. 11 on the Billboard 200 albums charts.

In the period since, OneRepublic released the single â€œI Ainâ€™t Worriedâ€ from the Top Gun: Maverick soundtrack in May 2022, followed by this Mayâ€™s â€œRunawayâ€ single and Septemberâ€™s â€œMirageâ€ from the Assassinâ€™s Creed Mirage video game.

OneRepublic was one of the headliners for this summerâ€™s inaugural Bud Light Backyard Tour summer concert series, a four-city tour that also included sets from Midland, Dashboard Confessional, Bush and Lindsay Ell. In September, OneRepublic released a majestic, re-recorded version of their breakthrough hit, â€œCounting Stars,â€ the song that Tedder said in an Instagram post â€œchanged the trajectory of our band.â€
